### Deaths incidence {.tabset}

#### By region
```{r reg-death, cache=TRUE, cache.extra=results_hash}
dth.dat <- dth.dat %>% filter(date <= start.date + end.hosp - 1)
make.plots(noisy_deaths, by = "region", data = dth.dat, x.label = "Date of death")
```

#### By age
```{r age-death, cache=TRUE, cache.extra=results_hash}
make.plots(noisy_deaths, by = "age", data = dth.dat, x.label = "Date of death")
```
